title: Uchi no Hentai Maid ni Osowareteru
original_name: うちの変態メイドに襲われてる
sinopse:
Spring has come...

Haruto, now fully fledged university student can live in an apartment independently, but his father suddenly sent him a "maid" because he was worried about his living conditions. The maid who came to his apartment turned out to be a huge pervert, and with her erotic behavior and dirty mind, the adolescent boy is always assaulted everyday by her.

(Source: MU, edited)
